<br><font color="red"><b>ðŸ”´ NumPy Functions (100+)</b></font>  
<br><b>ðŸ“Œ Array Creation</b>  
<br>array() â€“ Create an array from a list or iterable.  
<br>asarray() â€“ Convert input to an ndarray.  
<br>empty() â€“ Create an uninitialized array.  
<br>zeros() â€“ Create an array filled with zeros.  
<br>ones() â€“ Create an array filled with ones.  
<br>full() â€“ Create an array filled with a constant value.  
<br>arange() â€“ Create evenly spaced values within an interval.  
<br>linspace() â€“ Create evenly spaced numbers over a specified interval.  
<br>logspace() â€“ Create numbers spaced evenly on a log scale.  
<br>eye() â€“ Create a 2D identity matrix.  
<br>identity() â€“ Create an identity matrix.  

<br><b>ðŸ“Œ Array Attributes</b>  
<br>ndim â€“ Get number of dimensions.  
<br>shape â€“ Get dimensions of array.  
<br>size â€“ Total number of elements.  
<br>dtype â€“ Data type of elements.  
<br>itemsize â€“ Size in bytes of each element.  
<br>nbytes â€“ Total memory consumed by elements.  

<br><b>ðŸ“Œ Array Manipulation</b>  
<br>reshape() â€“ Reshape an array.  
<br>ravel() â€“ Flatten array into 1D (view).  
<br>flatten() â€“ Flatten array into 1D (copy).  
<br>transpose() â€“ Transpose array dimensions.  
<br>swapaxes() â€“ Interchange two axes.  
<br>concatenate() â€“ Join arrays along an axis.  
<br>stack() â€“ Stack arrays along new axis.  
<br>hstack() â€“ Stack arrays horizontally.  
<br>vstack() â€“ Stack arrays vertically.  
<br>split() â€“ Split array into multiple sub-arrays.  
<br>hsplit() â€“ Split along horizontal axis.  
<br>vsplit() â€“ Split along vertical axis.  
<br>tile() â€“ Repeat array elements.  
<br>repeat() â€“ Repeat elements of array.  
<br>take() â€“ Take elements by indices.  
<br>put() â€“ Place values into specified indices.  
<br>choose() â€“ Construct array from index arrays.  
<br>diagonal() â€“ Extract diagonal elements.  
<br>trace() â€“ Sum of diagonal elements.  

<br><b>ðŸ“Œ Arithmetic Operations</b>  
<br>add() â€“ Elementwise addition.  
<br>subtract() â€“ Elementwise subtraction.  
<br>multiply() â€“ Elementwise multiplication.  
<br>divide() â€“ Elementwise division.  
<br>power() â€“ Raise elements to power.  
<br>mod() â€“ Modulus of elements.  
<br>remainder() â€“ Remainder of division.  

<br><b>ðŸ“Œ Exponential & Logarithmic</b>  
<br>exp() â€“ Exponential of elements.  
<br>log() â€“ Natural logarithm.  
<br>log10() â€“ Base-10 logarithm.  
<br>sqrt() â€“ Square root.  

<br><b>ðŸ“Œ Trigonometric</b>  
<br>sin() â€“ Sine of elements.  
<br>cos() â€“ Cosine of elements.  
<br>tan() â€“ Tangent of elements.  
<br>arcsin() â€“ Inverse sine.  
<br>arccos() â€“ Inverse cosine.  
<br>arctan() â€“ Inverse tangent.  
<br>degrees() â€“ Convert radians to degrees.  
<br>radians() â€“ Convert degrees to radians.  
<br>hypot() â€“ Hypotenuse of coordinates.  

<br><b>ðŸ“Œ Statistics</b>  
<br>mean() â€“ Mean value.  
<br>median() â€“ Median value.  
<br>std() â€“ Standard deviation.  
<br>var() â€“ Variance.  
<br>min() â€“ Minimum element.  
<br>max() â€“ Maximum element.  
<br>percentile() â€“ Percentile value.  
<br>quantile() â€“ Quantile value.  
<br>argmin() â€“ Index of minimum.  
<br>argmax() â€“ Index of maximum.  
<br>average() â€“ Weighted average.  
<br>corrcoef() â€“ Correlation coefficient.  
<br>cov() â€“ Covariance matrix.  

<br><b>ðŸ“Œ Linear Algebra</b>  
<br>dot() â€“ Dot product.  
<br>vdot() â€“ Vector dot product.  
<br>inner() â€“ Inner product.  
<br>outer() â€“ Outer product.  
<br>matmul() â€“ Matrix multiplication.  
<br>tensordot() â€“ Tensor dot product.  
<br>einsum() â€“ Einstein summation.  
<br>linalg.inv() â€“ Inverse of matrix.  
<br>linalg.pinv() â€“ Pseudo-inverse.  
<br>linalg.det() â€“ Determinant.  
<br>linalg.eig() â€“ Eigenvalues and eigenvectors.  
<br>linalg.svd() â€“ Singular value decomposition.  
<br>linalg.norm() â€“ Matrix/vector norm.  
<br>linalg.solve() â€“ Solve linear equations.  
<br>linalg.matrix_rank() â€“ Rank of matrix.  

<br><b>ðŸ“Œ Random</b>  
<br>random.rand() â€“ Uniform random values.  
<br>random.randn() â€“ Standard normal values.  
<br>random.randint() â€“ Random integers.  
<br>random.choice() â€“ Random sample from array.  
<br>random.seed() â€“ Set random seed.  
<br>random.shuffle() â€“ Shuffle array in-place.  
<br>random.permutation() â€“ Randomly permute sequence.  
<br>random.uniform() â€“ Uniform distribution.  
<br>random.normal() â€“ Normal distribution.  
<br>random.binomial() â€“ Binomial distribution.  
<br>random.poisson() â€“ Poisson distribution.  
<br>random.exponential() â€“ Exponential distribution.  

<br><b>ðŸ“Œ FFT (Fast Fourier Transform)</b>  
<br>fft.fft() â€“ Compute 1D FFT.  
<br>fft.ifft() â€“ Compute 1D inverse FFT.  
<br>fft.fft2() â€“ Compute 2D FFT.  
<br>fft.ifft2() â€“ Compute 2D inverse FFT.  
<br>fft.fftn() â€“ N-dimensional FFT.  
<br>fft.ifftn() â€“ N-dimensional inverse FFT.  
<br>fft.fftshift() â€“ Shift zero frequency to center.  
<br>fft.ifftshift() â€“ Inverse shift of FFT.  

<br><b>ðŸ“Œ Miscellaneous</b>  
<br>where() â€“ Conditional selection.  
<br>unique() â€“ Unique elements.  
<br>sort() â€“ Sort array.  
<br>argsort() â€“ Indices for sorted order.  
<br>lexsort() â€“ Indirect sort with multiple keys.  
<br>searchsorted() â€“ Find indices for insertion.  
<br>meshgrid() â€“ Coordinate matrices from vectors.  
<br>mgrid â€“ Dense multi-dimensional grid.  
<br>ogrid â€“ Open multi-dimensional grid.  
<br>diag() â€“ Construct diagonal array.  
<br>diagflat() â€“ Create 2D diagonal array from 1D.  
<br>triu() â€“ Upper triangle of matrix.  
<br>tril() â€“ Lower triangle of matrix.
